plummet.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to suddenly and quickly decrease in value or amount
plummet.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Profits plummeted from £49 million to £11 million.
plummet.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to fall suddenly and quickly from a very high place
plummet.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The plane plummeted towards the Earth.
plummet.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to suddenly and quickly go down in value or amount
plummet.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The Nikkei index plummeted by 577.38 points yesterday.
Its stock plummeted 19% after an investment analyst said the company has had trouble selling its Internet commerce technology.
